Detailed Description

File filter filtering sound files

Class SoundFileFilter is a predefined file filter functor which filters sound files. These are actually midi, mmf, imelody, mpeg, amr, wav, 3gpp, spf, and aac files. Optionally directories get filtered, too.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SoundFileFilter::SoundFileFilter (  BOOLEAN  filter_dirs = FALSE  ) 
 

Constructs a sound file filter. If filter_dirs is TRUE then all directories get filtered, too.

Parameters:
filter_dirs Tells if directories shall be filtered.

Destroys a sound file filter.

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN SoundFileFilter::Complies (  const Path &  path  )  [virtual]
 

Tells if the file with path is a sound file of type midi, mmf, imelody, mpeg, amr, wav, 3gpp, spf, or aac or is a directory in case it shall filter directories, too.

Implements FileFilter.

Field Documentation

Tells if directories shall be filtered.
